Class: List

List(listopt)

Class for initializing and constructing Lists with chainable interface.

Constructor

new List(listopt)

Constructor for List. Accepts optional List to clone, string title, or list of items to copy.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
list List | string | Array.<OptionItem> <optional>
 Either a list to clone, a title to set for a new List, or an array of OptionItem to initialize a new list.
